summary: Diff adds a migration to insert sahilgarments16@gmail.com into secondaryAdminEmails, and wires a migration runner into backend/main.mo, but the provided truncated main.mo diff does not show (and therefore does not let us verify) that the configured secondary-admin email value is set to exactly sahilgarments16@gmail.com at startup or that the admin/secondary-admin privilege behavior is correctly applied. Unrequested changes include adding a new migration module and modifying project_state.json.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the backend secondary-admin configuration so the secondary admin email is set to exactly "sahilgarments16@gmail.com" (and the secondary-admin email allowlist includes this value at startup).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary for backend/main.mo is truncated and does not show any explicit configuration/default value initialization for the secondary admin email (only a migration that adds an email to a set). Based on the visible diff alone, we cannot confirm the configured secondary-admin email value is set to exactly the required string at startup, nor can we confirm the resulting isAdmin/isSuperAdmin and user-management restriction behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new backend migration module and wired a migration runner into the actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to update the secondary-admin email configuration in backend/main.mo; it did not request adding a migration system/file.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project_state.json feature summary/content (including documenting secondary admin configured email).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request modifying project_state.json or any documentation/state metadata files.
